description: The Streetrat Pickpocket is a nimble and cunning thief, often found in the bustling alleyways of large cities. They are known for their quick hands, sharp eyes, and a knack for slipping away unnoticed after lifting purses and trinkets from unsuspecting passersby.

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.description: The Streetrat Pickpocket can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.description: When the Streetrat Pickpocket is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
